armenian.title: Agent 044: Operation Gegard
armenian.overview: The film tells about an Argentinian agent of Armenian nationality, who was invited to Armenia to find and return Saint Gegard, stolen a few days ago. On the eve of the Pope's visit to Armenia, Saint Gegard was taken to the museum, but just seven days before his arrival, he was stolen from the museum. The special commission instructs the Argentine agent of the Armenian nationality, Henzel Brutens, to reveal the kidnapping of Gegard. From the first second of his arrival in Armenia, it becomes clear that Hansel is a failure, but somehow these failures turn into victory. He is forced to act secretly, because of this he constantly changes his appearance and appears in various funny situations.

armenian.title: Wedding in the rear
armenian.overview: The play “Wedding in the Rear” has been filmed, which means that right now in the online cinema ARMFilm.co you can watch the film of the same name. The picture tells about the events that took place in the zone of the Karabakh conflict. The April war, which lasted 4 days, became a difficult test for many people. The film 'Wedding in the Rear' is presented in an unusual format, because it is both a feature film and a performance. The plot is based on real events. April 2, 2016 is the start date of the four-day war. And it was on this day that the wedding took place, the participants of which were ordinary Armenians. During the celebration, 19-year-old residents were killed on the border, but in Gyumri, where the wedding was being played at that moment, no one knew about these tragic events. Death and the birth of a new family are antagonistic events, which is another proof of the expression 'woe and joy are always there.'' Watch this film that will make you empathize and allow you to experience many different emotions. All views in our online cinema are free. The complete absence of advertising is an added advantage.

armenian.title: Run or get married
armenian.overview: An animated TV series based on the popular children's book series 'Clifford the Big Red Dog'.

armenian.title: Alma's Way
armenian.overview: The engaging modern-day series stars 6-year-old Alma Rivera, a proud, confident Puerto Rican girl, who lives in the Bronx with her parents and younger brother, Junior, as well as a diverse group of close-knit and loving friends, family, and community members. In each 11-minute story, Alma speaks directly to young viewers, sharing her observations and feelings, working through challenges, and offering them a window into her everyday life. In every episode, Alma's Way aims to model self-awareness, responsible decision making, and empathy, encouraging kids to generate and value their own ideas and questions. As she uses 'Think-Through' moments to stop, listen, and process in the face of a tough decision, Alma reflects and takes action while demonstrating social awareness.

armenian.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
armenian.overview: Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and many other classic Looney Tunes characters have all new misadventures in this series inspired by their classic shorts. Most episodes consist of two full shorts and a brief mid-episode vignette.
